description: Lightweight, hardwearing and highly versatile, the Gamma LT Pant delivers light weather protection, air permeable comfort, and outstanding mobility. The abrasion resistant Fortius™ DW 2.0 fabric combines quick-drying nylon with elastane fibres for performance stretch. A brushed polyester waistband provides additional next-to-skin comfort. The Gamma LT’s articulated construction and gusseted crotch provide outstanding mobility and freedom while hiking, climbing, guiding or backpacking.
name: Arcteryx Gamma LT Pants, Short - Mens
